data.text: We stayed here for two nights.  Our room was lovely with a great view of the harbor.  The restaurant had a nice selection of food and drinks.  The food and service were excellent.  They were gracious enough to open the breakfast restaurant a bit early for us on our last day so we could get an early start.
data.title: Modern, upscale rooms

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guests,

Thank you very much for taking the time to share your  experience with others here on Trip Advisor. 

We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed both our facilities and services .

We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Key Hotel.

Best regards from Izmir.
owner_response.author: Burcu Yıldız

data.text: This hotel has offered us a great experience. Spacious and well cooled rooms at just the right temperature (considering the 40 celsius summer heat in Izmir), helpful staff and wonderful amenities. In walking distance from the konak pier (1 minute), clock tower (7 minutes) and bazaar (12 min). Highly recommended if you look for a comfortable stay in Izmir that is conveniently located.
data.title: Extremely comfortable stay!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thanks for taking time for that beautiful review.

See you soon hopefully.

Kind regards.
owner_response.author: Burcu Yıldız

data.text: This hotel was a pleasant surprise because it wasn't on my radar and was recommended by my knowledgeable local tour organizer. It is a boutique luxury hotel that provided a basically perfect experience. I had the Superior room, which was huge. Loved the modern touches in the room and throughout the hotel.
data.title: Boutique luxury hotel with modern touches

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thanks for taking time for that beautiful review.

See you soon hopefully.

Kind regards.
owner_response.author: Burcu Yıldız

data.text:
Wife and I visited Izmir, Turkey, in mid July '23, and stayed at the Key Hotel. Excellent location on the waterfront. Short walk to bars, restaurants, grand bazaar. Short taxi ride to local sights.
Hotel staff were so friendly and helpful. Breakfast was amazing - fruits, greens, scrambled eggs etc, etc. Loved the room - spacious for the 2 of us. Bathroom lighting a tad dim for shaving but no problem. Locals are friendly and many spoke English. I learned a few simple Turkish words before we arrived. Izmir is awesome.
data.title: Izmir Turkey

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Key Team is very happy with your kind words.

See you soon again, hopefully.

Warm regards.
owner_response.author: Burcu Yıldız

data.text:
One of the best hotels i stayed in superior room sea view worths really. 

Their bed is the most comfortable bed i have ever slept on. 

Their toiletries are top quality. Very decent hotel if 
You want really feel the luxurious place and service. 

My flight is late evening they were super helpful in offering me with good price to extend my stay thank you so much Marve you are a great help. 

Thanks Ozan Ozkan in reception. Thank you Yacoub for entertaining my Daughter. Thanks Hemet and Arif, Thanks beautiful lovely ladies in reception. Room service are super kind and helpful too their food very delicious try asparagus soup.
data.title: Wonderful place
